title: Proxies, consents, and authorizations
context: [ยง431:4-234] Proxies, consents, and authorizations. No domestic stock insurer, or any director, officer, or employee of the insurer, or any other person, shall solicit, or permit the use of the person&rsquo;s name to solicit, by mail or otherwise, any proxy, consent, or authorization with respect to any stock of the insurer in contravention of this part or schedule A in section 431:4-232 and schedule B in [section] 431:4-233. [L 2000, c 24, pt of ยง2]
